author: Source: The Wichita Eagle
title: U of L, UK receiving $3.7M grant for micro/nanotechnology - The Wichita Eagle
text:
A $3.7 million grant has been awarded to the University of Louisville and University of Kentucky to create a national center of excellence in micro/nanotechnology. The National Science Foundation grant announced Monday is one of 16 awarded to universities across the U.S. out of more than 100 that competed.
Start the conversation, or Read more at The Wichita Eagle.
